rules.text: Do not post or share any content that is illegal in Canada
Do not harass, dogpile, or dox users on this server or other servers
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia (including misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy"), xenophobia, casteism, fatphobia, or other forms of bigotry.
NSFW content and depictions of violence must be behind a content warning
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Don't spam or engage in excessive commercial posting (business accounts are allowed, though)
Read and follow the full Code of Conduct and Acceptable Use Policy section of our Terms of Service, available at https://ottawa.place/terms#coc

records.text: #cinema #movies #watching I have been busy getting out into the garden when the weather has felt like co-operating.  Movie watching has taken a bit of a back seat but I have managed to catch a one rewatch and a few Never Before Seen movies as my personal challenge reaches the mid year point.In honour of the NFx documentary on his life, I rewatched #GeneWilder in 1974s #YoungFrankenstein.  Sorry, that's Frankensteen  😂 New to me-1973s #Don'tLookNow starring the late and wonderful #DonaldSutherland.  WOWZA this was some freaky stuff but I liked it and was glued to the screen.  -1970s #Patton with #GeorgeCScott. I have only ever seen GCS in 2 other movies, #AnatomyOfAMurder and #DrStrangelove. Both good performances but jmo he deservedly won the Best Actor Oscar for his portrayal of Old Blood and Guts. I am not committing to anything over the next week or 2 but waiting in the queue are1960s #Psycho1979s #AllThatJazz1999s #FightClub

records.text: #cinema #movies #watching I have been busy getting out into the garden when the weather has felt like co-operating.  Movie watching has taken a bit of a back seat but I have managed to catch a one rewatch and a few Never Before Seen movies as my personal challenge reaches the mid year point.In honour of the NFx documentary on his life, I rewatched #GeneWilder in 1974s #YoungFrankenstein.  Sorry, that's Frankensteen  😂 New to me-1973s #Don'tLookNow starring the late and wonderful #DonaldSutherland.  WOWZA this was some freaky stuff but I liked it and was glued to the screen.  -1970s #Patton with #GeorgeCScott. I have only ever seen GCS in 2 other movies, #AnatomyOfAMurder and #DrStrangelove. Both good performances but jmo he deservedly won the Best Actor Oscar for his portrayal of Old Blood and Guts. I am not committing to anything over the next week or 2 but waiting in the queue are1960s #Psycho1979s #AllThatJazz1999s #FightClub

records.text: #cinema #movies #watching I have been busy getting out into the garden when the weather has felt like co-operating.  Movie watching has taken a bit of a back seat but I have managed to catch a one rewatch and a few Never Before Seen movies as my personal challenge reaches the mid year point.In honour of the NFx documentary on his life, I rewatched #GeneWilder in 1974s #YoungFrankenstein.  Sorry, that's Frankensteen  😂 New to me-1973s #Don'tLookNow starring the late and wonderful #DonaldSutherland.  WOWZA this was some freaky stuff but I liked it and was glued to the screen.  -1970s #Patton with #GeorgeCScott. I have only ever seen GCS in 2 other movies, #AnatomyOfAMurder and #DrStrangelove. Both good performances but jmo he deservedly won the Best Actor Oscar for his portrayal of Old Blood and Guts. I am not committing to anything over the next week or 2 but waiting in the queue are1960s #Psycho1979s #AllThatJazz1999s #FightClub
